Name: Coffin board
Description: The bottom board of a mummiform coffin, brightly painted. In the centre is a djed-pillar wrapped in green and red striped feathered bands, with udjat-eyes on the second transverse beam and at each end a falcon head, a uraeus with wig and a jackal. A head facing right, wearing a tripartite striated wig, divine beard and fillet with uraeus, emerges from the djed-pillar. On the head is a composite crown on a base of uraei; to the right and left are several gods. The head section contains the hieroglyph sign for the horizon with a sun disc and scarab.
